title: Courtyard or Chowk - means a space permanently open to sky enclosed on sides fully or partially by buildings and may be at ground level or any other level within or adjacent to a building
clause_text: Courtyard or Chowk - means a space permanently open to sky enclosed on sides fully or partially by buildings and may be at ground level or any other level within or adjacent to a building. Canopy - means a cantileveredprojection over any entrance to a building

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Courtyard or Chowk - means a space permanently open to sky enclosed on sides fully or partially by buildings and may be at ground level or any other level within or adjacent to a building.
